00013 class ADV
00014 {
00015 public:
00016         ADV(const ADT &owner__);
00017         ADV(const ADV &adv);
00018         virtual ~ADV(void);
00019 
00020         const ADT &owner(void) const;
00021 
00022         virtual void update(void) = 0;
00023 
00024 private:
00025         const ADT &owner_;
00026 
00027         ADV &operator=(const ADV &adv);         // do not define
00028 };
00029 
00030 // NOTE:  This list class is adapted from the one described by
00031 // Lippman in his second edition of the C++Primer.  The handling
00032 // of references is adapted from List.{h,cc}P in the GNU C++ library.
00033 
00034 class ADVListNode
00035 {
00036 private:
00037         ADVListNode(ADV & adv_);
00038         ADVListNode(ADV & adv_, ADVListNode * next_);
00039 
00040         static void reference(ADVListNode * node);
00041         static void dereference(ADVListNode * node);
00042 
00043         ADV &adv;
00044         ADVListNode *next;
00045         short ref;
00046 
00047         friend class ADVList;
00048 };
00049 
00050 class ADVList
00051 {
00052 public:
00053         ADVList(void);
00054         ADVList(ADV & adv);
00055         ADVList(const ADVList & list);
00056         ~ADVList(void);
00057         ADVList & operator = (const ADVList & list);
00058 
00059         int null(void) const;
00060 
00061         void empty(void);
00062         void append(ADV & adv);
00063         void append(const ADVList & list);
00064         void prepend(ADV & adv);
00065         void prepend(const ADVList & list);
00066         void del(const ADV & adv);
00067 
00068         Pix first(void) const;
00069         void next(Pix & p) const;
00070         const ADV & operator() (Pix p) const;
00071         ADV & operator() (Pix p);
00072 
00073 private:
00074         ADVListNode *head;
00075         ADVListNode *tail;
00076 };
00077 
00078 class ADT
00079 {
00080 public:
00081         ADT(void);
00082         ADT(const ADT &adt);
00083         virtual ~ADT(void);
00084         ADT &operator=(const ADT &adt);
00085 
00086         // Note: Constancy here is only logical, not literal.
00087         // The list part of the ADT changes, but the rest does not.
00088         virtual void synchronize(void) const;
00089         inline void attach(ADV &adv) const;
00090         inline void detach(const ADV &adv) const;
00091 
00092 private:
00093         mutable ADVList list;
00094 };
00095 
00096 inline const ADT &
00097 ADV::owner(void) const
00098 {
00099         return owner_;
00100 }
00101 
00102 inline
00103 ADV::ADV(const ADT &owner__)
00104         : owner_(owner__)
00105 {
00106         owner().attach(*this);
00107 }
00108 
00109 inline
00110 ADV::ADV(const ADV &adv)
00111         : owner_(adv.owner())
00112 {
00113         owner().attach(*this);
00114 }
00115 
00116 inline
00117 ADV::~ADV(void)
00118 {
00119         owner().detach(*this);
00120 }
00121 
00122 inline
00123 ADVListNode::ADVListNode(ADV & adv_)
00124         : adv(adv_),
00125           ref(1)
00126 {
00127 }
00128 
00129 inline
00130 ADVListNode::ADVListNode(ADV & adv_,
00131         ADVListNode * next_)
00132         : adv(adv_),
00133           next(next_),
00134           ref(1)
00135 {
00136 }
00137 
00138 inline void
00139 ADVListNode::reference(ADVListNode * node)
00140 {
00141         if (node != NULL)
00142                 ++node->ref;
00143 }
00144 
00145 inline
00146 ADVList::ADVList(void)
00147         : head(NULL),
00148           tail(NULL)
00149 {
00150 }
00151 
00152 inline
00153 ADVList::ADVList(ADV & adv)
00154         : head(new ADVListNode(adv, NULL)),
00155           tail(head)
00156 {
00157 }
00158 
00159 inline
00160 ADVList::ADVList(const ADVList & list)
00161         : head(list.head),
00162           tail(list.tail)
00163 {
00164         ADVListNode::reference(list.head);
00165 }
00166 
00167 inline
00168 ADVList::~ADVList(void)
00169 {
00170         ADVListNode::dereference(head);
00171 }
00172 
00173 inline ADVList &
00174 ADVList::operator = (const ADVList & list)
00175 {
00176         if (this != &list) {
00177                 ADVListNode::dereference(head);
00178                 ADVListNode::reference(list.head);
00179                 head = list.head;
00180                 tail = list.tail;
00181         }
00182         return *this;
00183 }
00184 
00185 inline int
00186 ADVList::null(void) const
00187 {
00188         return head == NULL;
00189 }
00190 
00191 inline void
00192 ADVList::empty(void)
00193 {
00194         ADVListNode::dereference(head);
00195         head = NULL;
00196         tail = NULL;
00197 }
00198 
00199 inline void
00200 ADVList::append(ADV & adv)
00201 {
00202         ADVListNode *node = new ADVListNode(adv, NULL);
00203         if (head == NULL)
00204                 head = node;
00205         else
00206                 tail->next = node;
00207         tail = node;
00208 }
00209 
00210 inline void
00211 ADVList::prepend(ADV & adv)
00212 {
00213         ADVListNode *node = head;
00214         head = new ADVListNode(adv, node);
00215         if (node == NULL)
00216                 tail = head;
00217 }
00218 
00219 inline Pix
00220 ADVList::first(void) const
00221 {
00222         return Pix(head);
00223 }
00224 
00225 inline void
00226 ADVList::next(Pix & p) const
00227 {
00228         if (p != NULL)
00229                 p = Pix(((ADVListNode *) p)->next);
00230 }
00231 
00232 inline const ADV &
00233 ADVList::operator() (Pix p) const
00234 {
00235         return ((ADVListNode *) p)->adv;
00236 }
00237 
00238 inline ADV &
00239 ADVList::operator() (Pix p)
00240 {
00241         return ((ADVListNode *) p)->adv;
00242 }

00244 inline
00245 ADT::ADT(void)
00246         : list()
00247 {
00248 }
00249 
00250 inline
00251 ADT::ADT(const ADT &adt)
00252         : list(adt.list)
00253 {
00254 }
00255 
00256 inline
00257 ADT::~ADT(void)
00258 {
00259 }
00260 
00261 inline ADT &
00262 ADT::operator=(const ADT &adt)
00263 {
00264         list = adt.list;
00265         return *this;
00266 }
00267 
00268 inline void
00269 ADT::attach(ADV &adv) const
00270 {
00271         list.append(adv);
00272 }
00273 
00274 inline void
00275 ADT::detach(const ADV &adv) const
00276 {
00277         list.del(adv);
00278 }
